boardgame.name: Tesla vs. Edison: War of Currents
boardgame.description: Tesla vs. Edison: War of Currents is a fast-playing, route building, economic and worker placement game focused on invention and industry in the roaring 1880's. It is easy-to-learn and appropriate for all gamers aged 14 and up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Nikola Tesla, Thomas Edison, and three other important inventors of the time struggle to determine who will be most remembered as the man who brought light to the masses. Contributing innovations in power generation, delivery, and illumination, you also choose to invest in Direct Current (DC) technology or the superior but later developing AC technology._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players control a small group of legendary figures from the War of Currents, each rated in Invention, Engineering, Finance and Public Relations. Each turn these legends are allocated to help research, commercialize or patent technology; influence the public's perception about the inventors and AC or DC technology; bid on and hopefully secure either residential, exhibition or power generation projects in cities around the 1880's United States. Money is tight and players may need to sell shares of their company in order to do everything they need to succeed. But be careful: other companies can buy stock you release, and the winner is the player whose company's stock is worth the most at the end of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

English game and in addition also german rules and cards (external - not delivered in the box) + 2 Promo Cards under the shrink on top of the box.

Artana (AAX1001) Compete to dominate the early electric light and power industry. Play as one of five genius inventors: Tesla, Edison, Brush, Maxim, and Thomson. Hire other renowned luminaries to help you expand your empire. Advance key technologies, claim celebrated electric projects, wage PR battles, and trade on the dynamic stock market to victory. Variable power worker placement game with each luminary and inventor uniquely rated in Invention, Manufacturing, Finance, and Propaganda. This creates a rich collection of characters who each perform differently in various contexts and provides great replay value.
German Spieleschmide version with German translation kit. Shrinkwrapped and unpunched.

Item location: 19520, Morgantown, PA Includes Powering Up expansion

I’m selling everything I got from the Powering up Kickstarter highest pledge: BASE PLUS EXPLASION ORGANIZED. Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/artana/tesla-vs-edison-powering-up. It includes the base game, Powering Up expansion, Broken Token organizer(assembled) and bonus AI pack. I played the game few times, in a pet free and non smoking household. Condition is like new. I’ve assembled the organizer and placed everything in the box as you can see pictured. I do not have the expansion box anymore, otherwise everything else is there and complete. One of the organizer bonus tokens used to track fame cracked because the Broken Token cut the hole too tight. I’ve glued it back together and is fully functional, but the crack is still visible. See picture. I will ship everything in the base box using USPS medium flat rate box. Payment only through PayPal. Buyer pays for shipping.
